message.body: So how's Mike?! Are you two enjoying yourselves?
He's doing good! And yes we are! We came back from DC yesterday so that was good! Are you enjoying your last week at work?
Well it's not my last week yet. One more to go. I just want it to be over with. But I'm trying to enjoy it. I'm trying to take it easy a bit, sitting and talking to people more than I normally would.
I actually was just thinking I had the week confused. Haha. Will we be seeing you all on Friday? We can see you guys earlier on Saturday too. Mike doesn't leave until 11 that night.
I'm not sure. I work on Saturday. But I could do Friday night as long as it's not too late of a night.
That works for us. We won't want to stay too late cause we'll just be getting home from the beach.
Ok cool. I'll ask Michael. He should be able to. He's been sooo busy and stressed out with work. I feel bad.
Aww! I can't imagine. He said it was big. Well let us know if you can!
Yeah. I'll let you know. I don't think he would turn down going out though. Haha.
Haha. Sounds good.
Oh. Wasn't Sam supposed to ask Jeff if he could do dinner this Friday night?
I thought she said she couldn't do anything Friday cause she was worming.
*working.
I don't know. Maybe she did and I didn't hear. I just remember you preferring Friday and thinking that I would have work the next day. But I thought she said ok.
Oh. Well I'll ask and see
Ok. Thanks.
Yup. She's working!
Oh. Ok then. That's fine.
And Michael is supposed to go to kiaras for a party Friday night so he said he doesn't know if he can go out. Sucks.
Oh boo!!! That's okay then! Don't worry! Mike and I wouldn't be getting home until 5 so I don't want to have to rush anyone.
Ok. But he said he'll see.
Okay.
